[ANN] GeoDataFrames 0.1 has also been released :tada: , see <https://github.com/evetion/GeoDataFrames.jl>. It's a simple wrapper on top of ArchGDAL that should make things easier. I saw a lot of questions/posts/issues on Slack/Discourse/Github on how to write shapefiles etc, while I needed a similar thing as well. It's still a work in progress, things will change (upstream) still.
```using GeoDataFrames; const GDF=GeoDataFrames
using DataFrames

coords = zip(rand(10), rand(10))
df = DataFrame(geom=createpoint.(coords), name="test");
GDF.write("test_points.shp", df)```
